review: I visited Deaverdura Food Truck and found it to be a mixed bag. The food is what stood out the most—delicious and authentic, with flavors that reminded me of Old San Juan. The generous portion sizes and value for money were also appreciated. However, the service was hit or miss. While some staff were friendly, others seemed disinterested and took a while to serve us. Given my preference for fast and friendly service, it didn't quite hit the mark, but the food quality still makes it worth a try.
